contexts.content: We decided to use REST over GraphQL for the context-bridge API to keep the MVP simple. GraphQL can be added in v2.
contexts.author: Sarah Chen

contexts.content: The Atlassian 2025 DevEx report confirms developers lose 6+ hours weekly to context switching. Our Context Bridge targets a 40% reduction.
contexts.author: Marcus Johnson

contexts.content: Our extension uses a finite state machine: Idle → Trigger → Retrieval → Display. Each transition is atomic and logged for observability.
contexts.author: Elena Rodriguez

contexts.title: Implement semantic ranking for context relevance
contexts.content: The ranking algorithm prioritizes: (1) keyword density match, (2) recency within 6 months, (3) author trust score. Filters out stale docs.
contexts.author: DevOps Team

contexts.content: Extension ↔ Webview communication uses postMessage API. Always sanitize messages and validate sender origin for security.
contexts.author: Security Team

contexts.content: We're targeting Mean Time to Context (MTTC) < 30 seconds. Current manual search takes 5-10 minutes on average.
contexts.author: David Park
